name: Wolf Night
description:
Defeat a den full of wevewolves as a reliable man.

Please check menu selections (items and controls) for additional information on how to play.

This was made for a Game Jam so it lacks in areas... but is still playable and enjoyable.

To toggle the bg music on or off, press the M Key.

-----------------------------------------------------
-----------------------------------------------------

Controls:

AWSD : Directional movement

K or Left Mouse Button: Hold down to use weapon.

L or Right Mouse Button: Press to use Virtue Power (when available).

-----------------------------------------------------
-----------------------------------------------------

General Information

- Pick a weapon.
Each weapons has different behaviour.

- Pick a virtue type (Fire, Electric or Spirit).
Your choice will give you a specific shield, a special power and weapon buff.

- The more werewolves you kill with your weapon, the faster it will level up. Each weapon level up will increase the velocity and recharge time of the weapon.

- Any werewolf you kill will help you to level up your virtue power. Each virtue level up will increase the size of your shield and increase your maximum HP by 100.

- Dead werewolves have a chance of dropping boots or crosses, the boots will increase your movement speed and crosses will replenish part of your health. Collect these as you will need them.

- Giant wolves will appear. Kill them and collect their hearts to unlock your virtue powers.
*If there is an uncollected wolf heart on the map, a small navigational arrow will appear next to the player hpbar and will guide the player to the heart.

- Collect the heart of the Final Wolf to complete the task.

-----------------------------------------------------
-----------------------------------------------------

Tips

- Holes on the ground can trap you, so avoid getting boxed in. Stay on your toes.

- Don't be afraid to rush headlong into mobs to get at those boots and crosses. It may be your only option from time to time.

- Watch out for bosses, they can move quickly and hurt quickly.

- Find a balance between being brave and being strategic.

Enjoy!
